attributes.action: Recognise Hull with an official Bank Hulliday
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The beauty and 'special nature' of the people's republic of Hull, East Yorkshire, should be recognised with an official celebratory Bank Hulliday Weekend, beginning Friday 8th June.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
